text: Thrist () is a 1961 Romanian drama movie directed by Mircea Drăgan and Mihai Iacob. It stars Mircea Balaban, Ion Besoiu, Flavia Buref, George Calboreanu, Jules Cazaban, Ilarion Ciobanu. ==Other websites== * Category:1961 drama movies Category:Romanian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Mircea Drăgan Category:Movies directed by Mihai Iacob
title: Thirst (1961 movie)
